response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product offers unparalleled benefits and capabilities that we believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $18,000. We're confident that this investment will pay off in numerous ways, providing you with long-term value and satisfaction. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 18000}
